body:
MaybeReduceResult MaglevGraphBuilder::TryBuildPropertyLoad(
    ValueNode* receiver, ValueNode* lookup_start_object, compiler::NameRef name,
    compiler::PropertyAccessInfo const& access_info) { ... }

Located in maglev/maglev-graph-builder.cc. This handles lowering for a single PropertyAccessInfo, calling BuildLoadField for data fields (including double fields -> LoadTaggedField -> LoadFloat64) or TryBuildPropertyGetterCall for accessor constants. It records known properties and inserts appropriate map checks via BuildCheckMaps.
explanation: Monomorphic property-load lowering entry. Important for the double-field load path that returns LoadFloat64 on HeapNumber fields or LoadTaggedFieldForProperty for tagged fields.
